headline: Is Medtronic (MDT) Still Reasonably Priced After Recent Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Medtronic at around US$101.84 is still a sensible price or starting to look stretched, you are not alone. The stock has posted returns of 1.0% over the last 7 days, 4.6% over the last 30 days, 6.0% year to date, 14.6% over 1 year and 30.4% over 3 years, with a 5 year return of 0.7%. Recent coverage has focused on Medtronic's position as a major medical devices company and how investors are weighing its product pipeline and competitive standing against the current...

headline: UBS Makes a Modest Target Increase on Medtronic (MDT), Keeps Neutral Rating
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 4, UBS raised its price recommendation on Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) to $104 from $103. The firm kept a Neutral rating on the stock. A day earlier, Medtronic announced plans to acquire privately held CathWorks in a deal […]
